<<<<<<< HEAD
The Christian knight compiled by Sir VVilliam VViseman Knight, for the pvblike weale and happinesse of England, Scotland, and Ireland. Wiseman, William, Sir, d. 1643.
[4], 7, [1], 39, [1], 41, [3], 75, [3], 83, [15] p.
by Iohn Legatt, Printed at London : 1619.
Formerly attributed to William Fitch. "The second oration. vpon panis angelorum", "The first charge by the Duke against duellum", and "The second charge by the ciuillian against auarice" each have caption title and separate pagination; register is continuous. Signatures: A-2L⁴. Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery, San Marino, California.
=======
The Christian knight compiled by Sir VVilliam VViseman Knight, for the pvblike weale and happinesse of England, Scotland, and Ireland. Wiseman, William, Sir, d. 1643.
[4], 7, [1], 39, [1], 41, [3], 75, [3], 83, [15] p.
by Iohn Legatt, Printed at London : 1619.
Formerly attributed to William Fitch. "The second oration. vpon panis angelorum", "The first charge by the Duke against duellum", and "The second charge by the ciuillian against auarice" each have caption title and separate pagination; register is continuous. Signatures: A-2L⁴. Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery, San Marino, California.
